programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Serial Killers
programme.desc: Two serial killers whose chilling crimes left their communities devastated.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Solid Foundation
programme.desc: Can Chef Colton Colburn-Wood of Cosmica in Boston trip up Chef Erin Miller of Urban Hearth in Cambridge? Both chefs skillfully build simple to complex foundations. But who will correctly replicate and get theirs plated in time?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Between The Bread
programme.desc: In honor of Pittsburgh's love of handhelds, Chef Claudy Pierre and Chef Alex Brown get creative crafting their best sandwich-inspired dishes.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: All Around The Wait, What Happened World
programme.desc: In this season's finale, Frank Nicotero finds a couple of good sports in New Orleans and Cincinnati. Watch as he revisits the most absurd moments from the first two seasons.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: These days, cameras are everywhere. Those up to no good can run, but Big Brother is always watching.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: A Family Man's Exciting Fresh Start
programme.desc: Nick packed up his family and moved to Savannah to be closer to nature. But since the move, he hasn’t been able to disconnect from work. Kinga takes him away from his desk to explore what the great state of Georgia has to offer.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Grisly Discovery on the Gulf Coast
programme.desc: When body parts wash ashore in the Gulf Coast over several days in 2012, investigators must identify the victim before they can find the killers. Even then, justice is elusive.

programme.title: Mo Gaba: Spirit Lives Forever
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: How a child living with cancer changed the Baltimore sports community forever.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Drug Busts
programme.desc: In these real-life stories of the illicit drug trade, learn how law enforcement beats the smugglers in their high-stakes game of cat and mouse.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Trolling Mount Horeb, WI
programme.desc: Stay the course in the Driftless Region of Wisconsin when you explore the Troll Capital of the World. Join a mug club, satisfy your sweet tooth, and journey back in time as you fall asleep in a restored inn.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Rebuilding in Braddock
programme.desc: Ed and Day tour Day's hometown neighborhood and make delicious sweet potato pies before touring the expansive Brew Gentleman brewery in Braddock.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Missing Link in the Mardi Gras Murders
programme.desc: The brutal murders of two trans women of color just 48 hours apart in New Orleans unsettle the community, leaving many wondering if the cases are connected. Detectives uncover clues, yet justice remains elusive.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Battle of the Titans
programme.desc: Renowned Chef and cookbook author Dave Becker of Sweet Basil & Juniper battles experienced competitor Eric LeBlanc of Red Heat Tavern. Will their vast culinary knowledge help one rise to the top or will the blindfold trip up these high end chefs?

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Charismatic Cosmetologist Racing to Meet Her Match at the Finish Line
programme.desc: 23-year-old cancer survivor Elizabeth is looking to find the one. She puts three blind dates to the test. Will love take a sharp turn for Sean, will she roll into a rhythm on skates with Cody or swing for the fences with Pat?

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Midwest Holiday Delights to Make Seasons Bright
programme.desc: Celebrate some of the Midwest's holiday favorites. Where scotcheroos take center stage, snicker salads delight, and the pink stuff surprises the pallet.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Grandmothers Pinky-Promise to Self Care
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: NFL Stud, Vivacious Host, & T-Shirt Royalty Reveal Top Hot Spots
programme.desc: In Kansas City, local notables Shawn Barber, Charlie Hustle and Nikki Vivas tell you why you need to suit up for electro-muscle stimulation, where to target a good time with ax throwing and how to find an underground speakeasy.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Catch the Spirit of Adventure, From Mars to Marathons
programme.desc: They take to the skies and seas, hit the open road, or attempt to reunite with a loved one. This episode of Stitch inspires the adventurous spirit through those who have bravely charted their own paths.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Louisville is Blazing a New Bourbon Trail
programme.desc: Kate learns how to play a Germantown street game, gets up close and personal with handcrafted, hand-charred bourbon barrels, and learns to fall back in love with whiskey – and natural wine.

programme.title: Always Remember Your Name
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A documentary of mistaken identity, hope, love, and the power of story by two Holocaust survivors.

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Chronicle: Pittsburgh After Dark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) In this episode of "Chronicle," we're going to look at the side of Pittsburgh you don't normally see: When the sun does down and the moon comes up.

programme.title: WTAE Chronicle
programme.sub-title: Chronicle: 10 Years of Pittsburgh Stories
programme.desc: Looking back on a decade of Chronicles at WTAE and revisiting some of the most impactful stories we’ve told about Pittsburghers.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.sub-title: In Transit: Busy Philipps
programme.desc: Esquire’s Dave Holmes chats with Girls5eva’s Busy Philipps. Dave and Busy play Travels and Tribulations, and Dave shares his Esquire-approved itinerary for things to do in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: WTAE 4 The Record
programme.sub-title: 4 The Record: AG Dave Sunday and Insp. General Michelle Henry
programme.desc: This morning, Pennsylvania Attorney General Dave Sunday and Inspector General Michelle Henry discuss several topics, including an opioid settlement with Big Pharma that could mean Pennsylvania will get as much as $200 million.
